text: Events from the year 2024 in the United States. == Events == === January === * January 6 – The Iranian-backed Houthi movement launch an attack on the USS Laboon. * January 9 – The Iranian-backed Houthi movement launches a series of attacks into the Red Sea, which is responded to by the navies of the United States and United Kingdom. * January 11 – The United States seizes control and later sinks an Iranian dhow, which was transporting supplies to the Houthi movement. The operation resulted in the entire crew of the vessel being captured as well as two U.S. Navy SEALs being lost at sea. * January 12 – A coalition, consisting of the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Bahrain, Canada and the Netherlands, launch a large-scale missile attack against the Houthi movement in Yemen. * January 13 – The USS Carney launches missiles towards and destroyed a Houthi radar facility at the al-Dailami Air Base in Yemen. * January 14 – The Iranian-backed Houthi movement launch yet another attack on the USS Laboon, only eight days after the previous attack. * January 15 **The Iranian-backed Houthi movement launch an attack on the Marshall Islands-flagged, United States-owned and operated bulk carrier Gibraltar Eagle. ** The Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC), a branch of the Iranian military, launched ballistic missiles towards the United States Consulate in Erbil, Iraq as well as an alleged Mossad spy headquarters. *January 16 – The United States destroyed four Houthi anti-ship ballistic missiles during an airstrike in Yemen. === June === * June 27 – The first 2024 U.S. presidential debate launched, took place in Atlanta, Georgia. === July === * July 13 – The attempted assassination on former president Donald Trump in Butler, Pennsylvania. * July 15 – The 2024 Republican National Convention was opened. * July 21 ** U.S. President Joe Biden withdrew from the presidential race, the first since Lyndon B. Johnson in 1968. ** The 2024 presidential campaign of Kamala Harris launched. === August === * August 6 – Kamala Harris picks Minnesota governor Tim Walz as her running mate. * August 19 – The 2024 Democratic National Convention was opened. === September === * September 10 – The second 2024 U.S. presidential debate launched, took place in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. ==Scheduled events== * November 5 – The 2024 United States presidential election will take place. ==References== Category:2024 in the United States
title: 2024 in the United States
